======
Coiled
======

ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to Coiled!

`Coiled <https://coiled.io/>`_ helps you easily create and manage `Dask <https://dask.org/>`_ deployments
to natively scale Python. We are currently in beta and welcoming early users. If you would like to join the beta, please
`sign up <https://coiled.typeform.com/to/mu6Inr4S>`_.

.. panels::
   :body: text-center
   :header: text-center h5 bg-white
   :footer: border-0 bg-white

   Want to try Coiled? Sign up for our beta!
